properties.displayName: Lsass Full Dump Request Via DumpType Registry Settings
properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where RegistryValueData =~ "DWORD (0x00000002)" and (RegistryKey contains "\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Windows Error Reporting\\LocalDumps\\DumpType" or RegistryKey contains "\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Windows Error Reporting\\LocalDumps\\lsass.exe\\DumpType")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the setting of the "DumpType" registry value to "2" which stands for a "Full Dump". Technique such as LSASS Shtinkering requires this value to be "2" in order to dump LSASS.
